This is a testharness.js-based test.

  doc.getPartRoot is not a function
[FAIL] Basic declarative DOM Parts (Template)
  doc.getPartRoot is not a function
[FAIL] Basic declarative DOM Parts (Clone)
  doc.getPartRoot is not a function

  template.content.getPartRoot is not a function
